Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 75th/Perry
ShortDescription: EB 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Vincennes, 76th and Lafayette, due to street blockage near 75th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Vincennes, 76th and Lafayette, due to street blockage near 75th/Perry.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
